property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: After activating 2nd Lt. Chavez: Examine a target inactive card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport 7: Retire the non-leader active agent with highest expense rating on your mission team: Move up to two opposing agents to headquarters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat 3: Before a higher-expense agent takes a wound, wound Achilles Gauge: Prevent the wound.

property.value: Fixer only Intel Craft 6: Examine the top three cards of your Agency Deck and rearrange them in any order: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma: After one of your agents is targeted by an action that would move him to headquarters: Cancel the action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma X: Target an agent. The target cannot assign into a mission team this turn. Anastasia cannot assign to a mission team this turn. The TN is the target's expense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft: Equip a card from your hand to Arkady as a gear. Mission Craft 3: Retire an active gear attached to Arkady: Retire a gear attached to a target opposing agent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +2 Cover. React Combat 6: Before this agent takes a wound: Prevent the wound,

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 6: Target up to three cards in a player's discard pile. Remove those cards from the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soldier only. May not be performed by a leader. Mission Combat X: Retire this agent: Retire an opposing agent with expense equal to or lower than this agent's. The TN is the target's combat.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Banshee Net

property.name: Rules
property.value: Banshee Net only Intel Craft: Perform up to three consecutive Intel actions with your non-leader agents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Faceman only. Intel Charisma: Examine the top 10 cards of your deck. You may reveal one Specialist card to all other players and put it in your hand. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Shadow Patriots

property.name: Rules
property.value: Barracuda gains +1 to all skills during Private missions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Charisma: Attach Battlefield Dominance to this mission. while Battlefield Dominance is attached, the mission text for Attacker and Defender gains: "If your leader is in your mission team and there is no opposing leader, all actions performed by opposing agents have +2 TN."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat: Wound an opposing agent who moved into a mission team with an action during this mission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Franchise only. Intel Craft 6: Discard a card, then reveal all but one card in your hand: Search your Agency Deck for a non-Unique card and put it in your hand.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Shadow Patriots

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: Before you declare whether you are extending the Mission Phase after winning a mission: Examine a target facedown mission in the queue.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your Agency Deck may contain up to six copies of Beretta Model 92. An agent with Beretta Model 92 equipped may have two Firearms equipped. If this agent has another Beretta Model 92 attached, this agent gains +1 combat and +1 cover.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft 4: After an action card increases the TN of an action performed by this agent: Reduce the TN increase to zero, then reduce the TN of the action by the same amount.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Soldier - Wheelman - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport X: Send an opposing Freelancer agent to headquarters. The TN is the target's transport plus craft. Mission Combat X: Wound an opposing Freelancer agent. The TN is the target's combat plus cover.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport X: If this is a fight or chase mission, wound an opposing agent. The TN is the target's transport plus combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Combat 8: Target an opponent. Wound all of that opponent's active agents with an expense rating higher than his leader.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Shadow Patriots

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow Patriots only. React Craft: After the Attacker and Defender consecutively pass at a mission: This agent may perform one Mission action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Leader only. Mission Combat 4: Give another agent a bonus to one of his skills equal to your leader's level, plus 2 if there is no opposing leader.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 5: Target an Exposed agent. The target's controller must reveal his hand to you. You may discard one of the revealed cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: After a player declares that he is extending the Mission Phase: End the Mission Phase.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft 6: Attach Cool Customer to this mission. While Cool Customer is attached, the Attacker or Defender mission text (your choice) gains: "The TN of actions performed by your agents at this mission may not be increased by the opponents' action cards."

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma: After mission teams are assigned, discard any number of cards from your hand: Reveal the same number of cards from the top of your Agency Deck. Until the end of the mission, the Attacker or Defender (you choice) may play the revealed cards as if they were in his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fixer only. React Craft: After an agent declares an action that may only be performed by a Faceman, Fixer, Pointman, Snoop, Soldier, or Wheelman: Cancel the action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Snoop only. React Craft: After one of your agents is targeted by an action that would expose or gain control of him: Cancel the action.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Banshee Net

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 4: Target an inactive enemy agent. The agent's controller may activate the agent. Ohterwise discard the target and draw a card. You may immediately play an additional Intel action.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fixer - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma X: Reduce a non-leader agent's printed skills to 0 until the end of the turn. The TN is the target's expense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma: Before a non-leader agent meets the TN of an action: Raise the TN of the action by 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Faceman only. Intel Charisma X: Target a non-leader agent. Put this card into play, face-up. This card becomes an exact copy of the target agent's printed card. Discard this card at the end of the turn. The TN is the target's expense.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fight - Private - Craft +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Atacker: Your Fixer and Snoop agents may perform: "Mission Craft 5: Lower the Objective Number for this mission by 1." Defender: Your Soldier and Pointman agents my perform: "Mission Combat: Increase the Objective Number for this mission by 1."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If this card is discarded from your hand due to an opponent's card effect, draw two cards. React Transport: Before an opponent forces you to discard one or more cards from your hand: Place a card in your hand on top of your Agency Deck. Draw two cards after the discarding action resolves.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Shadow Patriots

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft 6: After an action on an action card targets a mission in the mission queue: Cancel the action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Franchise only. React Craft 5: After an enemy agent targets one of your cards with a mission action, discard a card: Cancel the action. This agent does not need to be on a mission team to perform this action.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Public - Transport +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Your agents may perform actions as if this were a Fight mission. Defender: Your agents may perform: "Mission Transport 5: Send an opposing Exposed agent to his headquarters."

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma: After an enemy agent performs a React to one of your actions: Wound the reacting agent. Intel Charisma: Retire an agent that is not controlled by his owner.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Mastermind - Fixer - Henchman: Gerhard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft: Search your deck for 1 or 2 copies of "The Zero Sum". Put them in your hand. Mission Craft: Retire an agent on your mission team: The opposing player must target and wound two of his agents or retire all agents on his mission team.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wheelman only. React Transport X: After this agent is targeted by an action that would send him to headquarters: Cancel the action. If this agent has a vehicle attached, would the acting agent. The TN is the acting agent's transport.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport 6: After this agent is activated during a mission: Give this agent +3 to any skill until the mission ends.

property.value: The Krypt

property.value: React Craft X: Before a target player performs an Intel action: He cannot declare that he is running a mission with the action. The TN is twice the craft of the player's active leader.

property.value: Mission Combat 6: Retire EMP Pulse Grenade: Deactivate all gear equipped to agents at this mission. Until the end of the mission, activating gear is a Mission Craft action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: After this agent is wounded: Remove a wound from this agent. Until the end of the turn, this agent has +2 to all skills. Wound this agent at the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma: After an action by an enemy Freelancer agent targets one of your cards: Redirect the action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport: After this agent is activated during a mission: Equip a gear to this agent from your hand and activate it. You may draw an additional card during the Debrief Phase this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 7: Activate an inactive agent. You may immediately play another Intel action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat 7: Activate an enemy agent. Wound an enemy agent that activated since your last mission action. If this is a Public mission, expose this agent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Transport 7: Retire a Vehicle attached to Freewheeler or discard a card: Search your Agency Deck for a Vehicle gear, attach it to Freewheeler and activate it.

property.value: React Craft: After an agent on your mision team is retired: If you are the Attacker or Defender, move Gail into your mission team.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft X: Name a number and target an opponent. He must reveal a number of cards equal to the number named, or reveal his entire hand. The TN is twice the number named.

property.value: Dr. Kholera React Transport: After an action targets Dr. Kholera: Redirect the action to Gerhard. React Transport: After Gerhard activates: Search your discard pile, then Agency Deck, for an "Armored Trenchcoat" and a Firearm gear. Equip the cards to him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pointman only. Mission Craft 6: Until an action targeting this agent is successfully performed, opposing agents cannot target other agents in your mission team. You may immediately play another Mission action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: After Hidden Laboratory is activated, expose this agent if you are not a Franchise player. At the end of the turn, remove from the game all cards with the same title in your hand and discard pile.

property.value: Intel Craft: Discard a face-up Private mission from the queue.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Shadow Patriots

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma: Target a mission in the queue. Permenently increase the Victory Point value of the mission by 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport 8: After the Defender assigns his mission team: If you are not the Attacker or Defender, assign a mission team. Determine the starting player as normal. Each player may play actions or pass until all players pass consecutively. You cannot win the mission. Determine the winner as normal.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Snoop - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 7: Target an opponent. That player chooses a card in his hand and either places it on top of his Agency Deck or discards it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma: After an action targets one of your agents: Raise the TN by +4. React Charisma X: After an action targets Trent Jacobs: Redirect the action. The TN is the acting agent's craft plus charisma.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma X: Reduce one of an enemy agent's printed skills to zero. The TN is the target's craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport 5: Afer an action targets one of your cards: Increase the TN of the action by 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft: Target an agent. Reduce to zero all non-gear bonuses to the target's skills.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Shadow Patriots

property.name: Traits
property.value: Snoop - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 8: Target a mission in the queue. Until the end of the turn, if it is a fight mission, your agents have +1 combat at it; if it is a Intrigue mission, your agents have +1 charisma at it; if it is a chase mission, your agents have +1 transport at it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wheelman only. Mision Transport X: Target a Vehicle gear equipped to a target agent. Gain control of and move the gear to this agent. The TN is the gear's expense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma X: Target a non-leader agent. Until the end of the turn, all actions performed by the agent have their TNs increased by 2. The TN is the target's charisma plus craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft X: Discard a card: Search your Agency Deck for a Gadget and put it in your hand. The TN equals the Gadget's expense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat X: After Virus inflicts a wound on a non-leader agent: The target may not perform actions for the rest of the mission. The TN is the target's combat plus cover.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft: Retire a gear attached to Vivica Cage: Attach a gear from your hand or any player's discard pile to Vivica and activate it. Vivica has +3 expense for activating this gear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma: The next Charisma action this agent performs this turn has -4 TN.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft 6: After you discard one or more cards from your hand due to an opponent's card effect: Return twice that number of cards from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Mastermind - Faceman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma: Discard a card: Target up to two Freelancer agents in your discard pile. Place one of them in your hand and shuffle the other into your Agency deck.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Nine Tiger

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport: After an enemy agent moves into a mission team using an action: Wound the agent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft 7: Before an action modifies the TN of an action: Cancel the modifying action.
